org.sump.analyzer
Class DeviceController

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              org.sump.analyzer.DeviceController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, Configurable
public class DeviceController
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Runnable, Configurable

GUI Component that allows the user to control the device and start captures.

Its modelled after JFileChooser and should allow for non-dialog implementations making it somewhat reusable.

Version:
0.7
Author:
Michael "Mr. Sump" Poppitz
See Also:
Serialized Form
